Title: The Invisible Man
Plot: A mysterious man, whose head is completely covered in bandages, wants a room. The proprietors of the pub aren't used to making their house an inn during the winter months, but the man insists. They soon come to regret their decision. The man quickly runs out of money, and he has a violent temper besides. Worse still, he seems to be some kind of chemist and has filled his room with messy chemicals, test tubes, beakers and the like. When they try to throw him out, they make a ghastly discovery. Meanwhile, Flora Cranley appeals to her father to do something about the mysterious disappearance of Dr. Griffin, his assistant and her sweetheart. Her father's other assistant, the cowardly Dr. Kemp, is no help. He wants her for himself. Little does Flora guess that the wild tales, from newspapers and radio broadcasts, of an invisible homicidal maniac are stories of Dr. Griffin himself, who has discovered the secret of invisibility and gone mad in the process.
Writers: H.G. Wells, R.C. Sherriff, Preston Sturges, Philip Wylie
Stars: Claude Rains, Gloria Stuart, William Harrigan, Henry Travers

ActorList.Name: Claude Rains
ActorList.AsCharacter: Dr. Jack Griffin aka The Invisible Man

Similars.Title: The Bride of Frankenstein
Similars.Plot: Mary Shelley reveals the main characters of her novel survived: Dr. Frankenstein, goaded by an even madder scientist, builds his monster a mate.
Similars.Stars: Boris Karloff, Elsa Lanchester, Colin Clive

Similars.Title: The Mummy
Similars.Plot: An Egyptian mummy searches Cairo for the girl he thinks is his long-lost princess.
Similars.Stars: Boris Karloff, Zita Johann, David Manners

Similars.Title: Frankenstein
Similars.Plot: Dr. Frankenstein dares to tamper with life and death by creating a human monster out of lifeless body parts.
Similars.Stars: Colin Clive, Mae Clarke, Boris Karloff

Similars.Title: The Wolf Man
Similars.Plot: Larry Talbot returns to his father's castle in Wales and meets a beautiful woman. One fateful night, Talbot escorts her to a local carnival where they meet a mysterious gypsy fortune teller.
Similars.Stars: Claude Rains, Warren William, Ralph Bellamy

Similars.Title: Dracula
Similars.Plot: After a naive real estate agent succumbs to the will of Count Dracula, the two head to London where the vampire sleeps in his coffin by day and searches for potential victims by night.
Similars.Stars: Bela Lugosi, Helen Chandler, David Manners

Similars.Title: The Invisible Man Returns
Similars.Plot: The owner of a coal mining operation, falsely imprisoned for fratricide, takes a drug to make him invisible, despite its side effect: gradual madness.
Similars.Stars: Cedric Hardwicke, Vincent Price, Nan Grey

Similars.Title: Creature from the Black Lagoon
Similars.Plot: A strange prehistoric beast lurks in the depths of the Amazonian jungle. A group of scientists try to capture the animal and bring it back to civilization for study.
Similars.Stars: Richard Carlson, Julie Adams, Richard Denning

Similars.Title: Son of Frankenstein
Similars.Plot: Returning to the ancestral castle long after the death of the monster, the son of Dr. Frankenstein meets a mad shepherd who is hiding the comatose creature. To clear the family name, he revives the creature and tries to rehabilitate him.
Similars.Stars: Boris Karloff, Basil Rathbone, Bela Lugosi

Similars.Title: The Invisible Woman
Similars.Plot: An attractive model with an ulterior motive volunteers as guinea pig for an invisibility machine.
Similars.Stars: Virginia Bruce, John Barrymore, John Howard

Similars.Title: Phantom of the Opera
Similars.Plot: An acid-scarred composer rises from the Paris sewers to boost his favorite opera understudy's career.
Similars.Stars: Nelson Eddy, Susanna Foster, Claude Rains

Similars.Title: Frankenstein Meets the Wolf Man
Similars.Plot: The resurrected Wolf Man, seeking a cure for his malady, enlists the aid of a mad scientist, who claims he will not only rid the Wolf Man of his nocturnal metamorphosis, but also revive the frozen body of Frankenstein's inhuman creation.
Similars.Stars: Lon Chaney Jr., Ilona Massey, Patric Knowles

Similars.Title: Dracula's Daughter
Similars.Plot: When Countess Marya Zaleska appears in London, mysterious events occur leading Dr. Von Helsing to believe the Countess must be a vampire.
Similars.Stars: Otto Kruger, Gloria Holden, Marguerite Churchill
